# isRelative

**Instance Property**

Returns true if this path is not absolute (see `isAbsolute`).

## Declaration

```swift
var isRelative: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

Examples:

- Unix:

- `~/bar`
- `tmp/foo.txt`
- Windows:

- `bar\baz`
- `C:Users\`
- `\Users`
title: isRelative
